The box with the glass and the handle.

Pan filled.

Hops.
Minced chicken. (of not in the future updates will be much good)
Minced pork. (also)
Ground beef. (also)
Yum.
Wrapper of the candy. (You can use the money!)
Now the burger of beef and pork =)
Beer. +8 HP.
不懂英语，看不懂，自己翻译。
